settings.settings_private_description: If you wish to manipulate any options You can set about you with all the commands as follows

settings.settings_server_description: Prefix, language, notification fields, etc., these settings only apply to this server. You can customize it as you like...

settings.prefix_no_more_than_six_characters: ❎ The prefix to call me should not be greater than or equal to 6 characters...

about.my_profile_detail:
My name is %s, born on Sunday June 21, 2019. I live in a house. __Chaiwat Suwannarat(Masashi)__ gave birth to me and gave me various talents. It is my responsibility to help you feel comfortableincreased with various **commands** that I have studied all to everyone in the place where I live I hope everyone will be happy to be with me!! And thank you for all the help and support of my lovely benefactors. Thank you very much.

[Official Website](https://maseshi.web.app/)
[Privacy Policy](https://maseshi.web.app/privacy-policy) | [Terms and Conditions Service](https://maseshi.web.app/terms-of-service)

© 2020-2021 Chaiwat Suwannarat. All rights reserved.

credits.creator_credit_description: Some creators are both contributors. Some of them come from outside.. Thank you for all your support
credits.natsuki_marina_credit:
Info: some pictures and avatars 
From: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/482462 
Website: https://marina71712.wixsite.com/0-0v

help.command_incorrect_guide: Eh...no command. Try rechecking by typing `%s` to see a list of all my commands.
help.unknown_how_to_use: There is no way to use it.
help.tip: Tip: **Alias** can be used in place of each command, for example `%s1` is replaced with `%s2`
commands_description: All the commands that I have learned or studied understandable and practical
which before calling me Must have a prefix **%s**
`<>` means required and `()` is optional, may or may not be answered.
For details of each command type `%s command` and the wish will come true!!

guildCreate.description:
Hello..I'd like to thank you for inviting me to this %s.
Someone seems to be wondering what I can do? Oh, wash the dishes, do the laundry. It's awesome, isn't it~ haha, where is it? I'm kidding
guildCreate.advice_detail: If you're the owner of this guild.. I'd like to complete the guild setup before I actually use it, because something you might not need. So try the `Ssettings` command.
guildCreate.support_multiple_languages_detail: I support multiple languages. To change the language You can set it by `Ssettings guild lang <language code>`
guildCreate.help_information_and_documentation_detai:
Want to know what I can do?..it's easy. Just type `Shelp` and someone will tell you. Of course, just go to the link below and there will be documentation that the developer and others. He wrote it for you
> https://maseshi.web.app/documents#why-shioru?

guildMemberAdd.greet:
Hello new member. **This is an automated message** 
Thank you for joining our server. Please read the information about this server carefully before starting to talk to everyone.

guildMemberRemove.user_has_exited: Has escaped from this server...(let's go somewhere with him..)

messageCreate.user_is_not_allowed: 🚫 I can't get you to use this command. If you don't have these permissions: **%s**
messageCreate.client_is_not_allowed: 🚫 Umm.. I'm missing some permissions. So I can't go on, including **%s**

Error result:
```JavaScript
%s7
```
